title: Android 10 got weird notification bar overlap or cutoff issue
content: In late Oct, my Pixel 3a XL suddenly got a weird notification bar overlap or cutoff issue like this. I can't see the quick actions in the notification item, and I can't expand it by swiping down. Also, there's a weird transparent bar on my lock screen too
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3a XL
